name: Stegosaurus

action.name: Tail
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (6d6 + 5) piercing damage.

description:
This heavily built dinosaur has rows of plates on its back and a flexible, spiked tail held high to strike predators. It tends to travel in herds of mixed ages.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 140, Tomb of Annihilation
